com.github.moribund.objects.playable.players

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.moribund.objects.playable.players.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Locatable, Movable, PlayableCharacter

    public final class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayableCharacter
    The Player that represents somebody being controlled by the client of its respective Connection.
